messages.content: This election is about sending a strong champion for Portsmouth to fight our cause in Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight the £10 million in cuts to Portsmouth schools being proposed by the Conservatives.

I will fight to keep the 'triple-lock', which guarantees increases in the state pension, to ensure that older people in Portsmouth can retire in dignity, knowing they can afford the care they will need.
I will fight for Portsmouth businesses to have access to the Single Market to protect local jobs.
Nationally, the Liberal Democrats are proposing an extra £6 billion to support our NHS. This investment is crucial for overstretched hospitals like our own Q.A. Hospital in Cosham.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour, and Jeremy Corbyn, are out of the race nationally and locally.

issues.defence: As Council Leader I fought to keep the Royal Navy in Portsmouth.
issues.economy: I will fight for Portsmouth businesses to have access to the Single Market to protect local jobs.
issues.education: I will fight the £10 million in cuts to Portsmouth schools being proposed by the Conservatives.
issues.health: Nationally, the Liberal Democrats are proposing an extra £6 billion to support our NHS. This investment is crucial for overstretched hospitals like our own Q.A. Hospital in Cosham.
issues.socialWelfare: I will fight to keep the 'triple-lock', which guarantees increases in the state pension, to ensure that older people in Portsmouth can retire in dignity, knowing they can afford the care they will need.

community.content: I will always put our city and local people first; I won’t hesitate to say no to the ‘party line’ if I don’t think it is in our city’s interests.

leaflet.personalStatement: Portsmouth needs a strong local voice in Parliament. I will always put our city and local people first; I won’t hesitate to say no to the ‘party line’ if I think it is not in our city’s interests. I will be a different sort of MP. I will always put Portsmouth first in everything I do. I won't hesitate to say no to the 'party line' if I don't think it is in the interests of local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: I fought to keep the Royal Navy in Portsmouth, pushed through the loan to help Pompey supporters save our football club and invested millions into improving local schools.

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. Labour, and Jeremy Corbyn, are out of the race nationally and locally. Our choice is between a local Lib Dem who will fight for Portsmouth, or an ineffective Conservative MP who will simply follow the party line.

examples: I will fight the £10 million in cuts to Portsmouth schools being proposed by the Conservatives.
Nationally, the Liberal Democrats are proposing an extra £6 billion to support our NHS.
This election is about sending a strong champion for Portsmouth to fight our cause in Westminster.
I will always put Portsmouth first in everything I do.
Our choice is between a local Lib Dem who will fight for Portsmouth, or an ineffective Conservative MP who will simply follow the party line.
I fought to keep the Royal Navy in Portsmouth.
I will fight for Portsmouth businesses to have access to the Single Market to protect local jobs.
I will fight the £10 million in cuts to Portsmouth schools being proposed by the Conservatives.
Nationally, the Liberal Democrats are proposing an extra £6 billion to support our NHS.

personalStories.story: As Council Leader I fought to keep the Royal Navy in Portsmouth, pushed through the loan to help Pompey supporters save our football club and invested millions into improving local schools.

examples: Labour, and Jeremy Corbyn, are out of the race nationally and locally.
an ineffective Conservative MP who will simply follow the party line.
